item.title: Research
item.description: Most up-to-date list of publications is available at Google Scholar. You can also find me at Researchgate, DBLP, ORCID, IEEE Xplore and ETIS. Journals t-Private Information Retrieval Schemes Using Transitive Codes. Ragnar Freij-Hollanti, Oliver W. Gnilke, Camilla Hollanti, Anna-Lena Horlemann-Trautmann, David Karpuk, and Ivo Kubjas. IEEE Transactions on Information Theory, volume 65, issue 4, pages 2107-2118, April 2019. Proceedings On Trade-offs of Applying Block Chains for Electronic Voting Bulletin Boards.
